landing.title: The Bull-Free Twitter experience you always wanted
landing.subTitle: A new way to Twitter
landing.description: Get a daily update for the Twitter accounts you care about. You see every tweet just like on Twitter, but without any of the ads, retweets, or likes that get in the way of your experience. All of this in a fast and easy to digest format, delivered straight to your inbox.

checkBoxes.allTweets: Every Tweet You Would See on Twitter

steps.create: Create a free No Bull Twitter Account
steps.receive: Receive curated content into your inbox

authentication.signUp: Sign up for No Bull Twitter
authentication.signUpDescription: Sign up using your Google account
authentication.earlyAccess: Sign up to get early access to the No Bull Twitter beta
authentication.earlyAccessThankYou: Thank you for signing up! We'll email you when it's open!
authentication.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Login here.
authentication.doNotHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up here.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.followNote: Type in the username of the Twitter account you would like to follow
profile.followingNote: Your daily update will have tweets from all the following accounts
profile.reachedLimit: You have reached the limit for accounts you can subscribe to
